name: Staging Areas
Lore: 'The Alliance carefully chooses docking bays from which to launch limited offensives.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your Force generation is +1 at each docking bay you occupy (or +2 if you control). You non-unique Star Cruisers are deploy -1 and may deploy to same battleground system as any rebel starship. (Immune to Alter.)',
